name: Waltz of the Night Light
text:
Can be used if you have a "Lunalight Cat Dancer" Fusion Monster on the field. Play 1 non-Fusion "Lunalight" monster from your Graveyard in face-down Defense Position to your field. Then play a monster with the highest ATK from your opponent's Graveyard to their field in Attack Position (monster with ? ATK is treated as 0). During the turn you use this Skill, you cannot Special Summon any monsters except "Lunalight" Fusion Monsters.
This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
